participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: sarcastic and straightforward, often dismissive of things that don't interest him.
participant_1.background: i work from home. i watch too much tv in my spare time. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: cheerful and a bit quirky, she enjoys sharing unique experiences and finds joy in simple things.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is red. i am a christian. my sister is a pole dancer. i enjoy listening to classical music. i can drive a tractor.
